Headline: Growth Strategist & Business Builder | GTM, Product, Partnerships | Founder @ Conwert.in | Fintech, Proptech, F&B | Ex-EnKash, OYO, IWG | UCLA PGP
Comment:
Never liked it - the taste, the effect, the after effect. 

Dietrich created FOMO before it was a buzzword Avik Ashar. Also, human nature is such that it gravitates towards what is prohibited. There's a certain thrill to it. 

Also, even today, the moment you say Exclusive or Only On Invite (some sort of barrier), people want in. Being part of an elite community somehow plays into our need to be a part of it.

Headline: ACCA professional level candidate (12/13) | CFA Scholar | Editorial Board Lead, SIFA | Strategic Finance & Market Intelligence
Comment: Red bull is a F1 team that happens to sell drinks haha

Headline: Marketing for early-stage brands | Ex CRED, Bain & Co
Comment: Another fun fact I love - the world is slowly moving towards sobriety. More & more people are giving up alcohol, but then it's too awkward to be out at a party or a club with nothing in your hand. A coffee or tea feels fairly random. So guess who is winning in that space too?

Headline: Entrepreneur | Founder @ Adventroz – Travel. Culture. Legacy. | Helping Founders Build Smarter With Tech, Marketing & Capital
Comment:
Red Bull didn’t build a beverage brand.
They built a mythology.
They turned a commodity drink into a cultural asset by manufacturing perception long before manufacturing demand.
That’s why competitors copy the product, but never the meaning.
